Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
WriteAllToDevice
Method.Description: Write to device "children" array of proxyObjects
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.children = ##class(%ListOfObjects).%New()
&sql(DECLARE Curr1 CURSOR FOR SELECT ID, Name->Value FROM Dance_Data.CompetitionType)
&sql(OPEN Curr1) for { &sql(FETCH Curr1 INTO :id, :name) quit:(SQLCODE '= 0)
set type = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set type.id = id set type.name = name
do proxy.children.Insert(type) }
&sql(CLOSE Curr1)
do proxy.%ToJSON()
quit $$$OK
